resources.string: The following quiz consists of 8 questions regarding udacity and all of them must be answered.So please kindly login to attempt the quiz.
The quiz is for a total of 12 marks.Hope you enjoy it.
Q U I Z A P P
"2.Which of the following atatements about udacity is correct?
By the summer of 2012 Udacity has students in 203 countries.
Udacity has most of its students in US.
By summer of 2012 India has 7% of students enrolled in udacity.
3.In 2014,first massive online open degree was opened by?
4.Udacity is currently available in which language?
5.What does the course format of udacity comprise of?
6.What is the type of education Udacity provides?
7.In which year did Sebastian Thrun won the Smithsonian American Ingenuity in Education Award for his work with Udacity?
